A 75-foot scroll-style infographic of Route 66 across California developed for the Route 66 Pathway Project highlighting local art, history, and natural phenomena.
A series of illustrations exploring various digital production techniques.
A selection of sketches taken from several sketchbooks I carried with me during my time studying in China and Japan.
A study utilizing packing to generate form. Final image; analogue study completed in archival ink on 36" x 36" bristol paper in collaboration with Amy Suzuki.
Illustrations produced by Cal Poly Pomona Architecture students following a workshop series I conducted covering advanced digital modeling tools and graphic representation.
